updates.download_ready: Update downloaded and ready to install!

updates.auto_install: The update will be installed automatically when you quit the app.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.default_usage: Extensions enabled here are used as the default for new chats. You can also toggle active extensions during chat.

schedule.no_id: No schedule ID provided. Return to schedules list.
schedule.no_sessions: No sessions found for this schedule.
schedule.cannot_modify_running: Cannot trigger or modify a schedule while it's already running.

schedule.name: Name:
schedule.title: Title: {title}

recipes.slash_removed_msg: Recipe slash command has been removed

recipes.slash_usage: Use /{command} in any chat to run this recipe
recipes.extensions_help: Select which extensions should be available when running this recipe. Leave empty to use default extensions.

provider.onboarding: Select an AI model provider to get started with goose. You'll need to use API keys generated by each provider which will be encrypted and stored locally. You can change your provider at any time in settings.

tunnel.title: Remote Access
tunnel.preview_desc: Enable remote access to goose from mobile devices using secure tunneling.
tunnel.qr_help: Scan this QR code with the goose mobile app. Do not share this code with anyone else as it is for your personal access.
tunnel.appstore_qr_help: Scan this QR code with your iPhone camera to install the goose mobile app from the App Store

settings.appearance_desc: Configure how goose appears on your system
settings.theme_desc: Customize the look and feel of goose
settings.help_desc: Help us improve goose by reporting issues or requesting new features
settings.updates_desc: Check for and install updates to keep goose running at its best
settings.notifications_desc: Notifications are managed by your OS
settings.menu_bar_icon_desc: Show goose in the menu bar
settings.prevent_sleep_desc: Keep your computer awake while goose is running a task (screen can still lock)
settings.cost_tracking_desc: Show model pricing and usage costs
settings.notify_macos_3: Find and select goose in the application list
settings.notify_macos_4: Enable notifications and adjust settings as desired
settings.notify_windows_3: Find and select goose in the application list
settings.notify_windows_4: Toggle notifications on and adjust settings as desired
